item.description: Purchase domain for godaddy Host site in github Configure go daddy domain to git hub page f the domain has been forwarded or automatically connected this would need to be removed if you’re going to edit the DNS manually. Here is an article on the connection wizard, if anything is on in there make sure to turn it off. https://www.godaddy.com/help/forward-a-domain-12123 A record- Host: @
